content: Provide a list of 15 words that contain 'tion' somewhere in them.

Sure! Here are 15 words that contain "tion" somewhere in them:

1. Information
2. Education
3. Celebration
4. Application
5. Communication
6. Innovation
7. Contribution
8. Imagination
9. Vacation
10. Reservation
11. Foundation
12. Station
13. Situation
14. Operation
15. Solution

I hope this helps! If you need more words or have any other questions, feel free to ask.
